home.title: EUMS - Home
homepage.newsletter.title: Newsletter
homepage.newsletter.description: Broad, in debth, all-European politics. And most of all, simple. Sign up today!
contact.thankYouMessage: Your message has been successfully sent. We will get back to you soon.
contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.errorMessage: There has been an error. Please try again.
about.welcomeDescription: Our purpose? Delivering easy-to-digest, comprehensive, and easy-to-understand information about EU news and politics.
about.subchannelsDescription: We have several subchannels that focus on specific topics or languages. Check them out!
team.lambertus.description: I’m 36, from the Netherlands, living in Germany, and I started the EUMS brand to help people understand the EU better after Brexit showed me how little most of us really know about it.
team.elliot.description: I'm a Dutch student in Poland with a passion for politics, international relations, and digital spaces, working at EU Made Simple to strengthen informed democracies by interviewing experts, connecting like-minded groups, and representing the platform beyond its videos.
team.paul.description: I’m 23, from France, and I am European. I really got into EU politics after the Russian invasion of Ukraine, and since then, I’ve been dedicated to making European politics more accessible.
team.jonathan.description: I'm from Munich - a Spanish-socialized German with Austrian humor, living in Italy, looking like a Swede, loving the Balkans, passionate about languages, sports, and storytelling, and working at EUMS to explore the 450 million lives across 27 countries that make up Europe.
newsletter.title: EU Made Simple Newspaper
newsletter.description: Stay informed with our latest updates!
newsletter.error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
footer.joinCommunity.title: Join the Community
footer.joinCommunity.description: Get involved, connect with others and
footer.supportUs.title: Support Us
footer.supportUs.description: You can support EU Made Simple by many different means, here's how:
footer.supportUs.patreon.title: Become a Patreon
footer.supportUs.patreon.description: and be part of the EUMS members! By becoming a Patreon you can even have influence over decision making of the community strategy or choose which topics we will treat in our videos*.
footer.supportUs.createContent.title: Create content
footer.supportUs.createContent.descripti: for us by writing your own articles that could be published on our site, or do a coverage on our YouTube content in your local language to engage with a wider audience and help us create more social media content!
footer.title: EU Made Simple
